input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Blue Spruce Flip Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7.5' Fairbanks Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 350 Clear Warm'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Colorado Mountain Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7-ft. Pre-Lit Kingswood Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Norway Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 9 ft Green Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 4.5 Foot Pre-Lit Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red Spruce Slim Flip Tree'
  - Name='Gerson 3-Pack Pre-Lit Alpine Trees with Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Frosted Yukon Spruce Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6-ft Pine Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T1615'
  - Name='Vickerman 2' Natural Bark Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree Warm White Dura-Lit LED Lights'
  - Name='Homcom 7' Downswept Slim Snow Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Lavender Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Glitzhome 4ft Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with 100 Warm White Light (Set of 2)'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 3-Ft. Snowy Downswept Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Denali White Christmas Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Frosted BH Balsam Fir Tree'
  - Name='Andover Mills Lighted Artificial Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6 ft. Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 5' Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Blue Spruce Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree species (Blue Spruce vs Douglas Fir) and no indication of downswept branches; quality brand but less direct match in silhouette and species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7.5' Fairbanks Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 350 Clear Warm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fairbanks Fir somewhat related species, similar height (7.5 ft), pre-lit with clear lights, but less branch tip realism detail described and no downswept mention; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (White Spruce), noted as narrow silhouette (not downswept or full), so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Colorado Mountain Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species and no indication of downswept style; standard spruce tree, thus lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7-ft. Pre-Lit Kingswood Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but pencil (narrow) silhouette, different fir species, pre-lit; difference in shape reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Norway Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Norway Spruce), no downswept or downswept style noted, less similar shape or features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 9 ft Green Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species and larger height, but unlit (no pre-lit feature) and described as traditional rather than downswept shape; lowers relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 4.5 Foot Pre-Lit Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir tree with downswept branch style implied; smaller height but similar construction and use, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red Spruce Slim Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Red Spruce), described as slim rather than full or downswept, flip branches feature similar to hinged but less aligned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gerson 3-Pack Pre-Lit Alpine Trees with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Alpine trees in a pack, likely smaller accent trees rather than a full downswept Douglas Fir; pre-lit but less similar in scale and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Frosted Yukon Spruce Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species and frosted (likely flocked) which is a finish detail; no downswept or downswept style noted.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6-ft Pine Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T1615
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine tree with similar height, though different species (pine vs fir) and potentially different silhouette not downswept; moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 2' Natural Bark Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree Warm White Dura-Lit LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller size tree (2'), alpine style rather than fir, focus on bark detail rather than full realistic branch tips; low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Homcom 7' Downswept Slim Snow Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and downswept branch style, though slim silhouette and snow/flocked finish differs; LED pre-lit, moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Lavender Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Color (lavender) is unusual and not typical of real branch finishes; likely novelty or artificial decorative tree unlike realistic downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 4ft Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with 100 Warm White Light (Set of 2)
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller size, flocked finish, and sold in set implicate decorative style, less realistic and downswept style than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Blue Spruce), traditional (non-downswept) shape; less similar silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 3-Ft. Snowy Downswept Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Downswept style and clear lights similar to reference, but much smaller size and likely less full construction; moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Denali White Christmas Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Most realistic claim aligns with the Feel Real branch tip tech; however, white fir and less mention of downswept style; moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Frosted BH Balsam Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same fir species but frosted finish and no mention of downswept styling; moderately similar foliage construction but less matching silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Andover Mills Lighted Artificial Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted fir tree from different brand, no indication of downswept branch style, so moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, exact species, downswept style, pre-lit with clear lights, just slightly shorter height; very high relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 5' Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree but smaller size and no species or downswept style specified; moderately relevant as general pre-lit fir-type tree.
